Installing necessary libraries if not installed already

Importing necessary libraries

```{r}
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

Reading files

```{r}
disease_info <- read.table("../raw_data/Group6/Disease_information.txt", sep = ",")
disease_info[c("disease_id", "disease_term", "gene_accession_id", "phenodigm_score")] <- str_split_fixed(disease_info[2], ',',4)
head(disease_info)
```
